description.value:
Prerequisite: Dexterity 13, Two-Weapon Fighting feat

Benefit: While wielding a melee weapon in each hand, you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC and Reflex.

Update (8/5/2010)

Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 319, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 320.
